suggested.title: Mediterranean Veggie Pasta
suggested.summary: Delicious mediterranean veggie pasta with a unique twist and fresh ingredients. Perfect for any meal.
instructions: Prepare all ingredients and equipment
Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat
Add onion and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes
Add garlic and cook for another minute until fragrant
Add protein and cook until browned on all sides
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-6 minutes
Season with salt, pepper and other spices
Add any liquid ingredients and bring to a simmer
Cook for the remaining time until everything is tender
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed
Serve hot, garnished with fresh herbs
